summary: The script orchestrates the end‑to‑end workflow for training, evaluating and optionally predicting with a CompGCN‑based knowledge‑graph embedding model. It parses command‑line arguments, loads graph data, constructs the CompGCN‑ConvE model, runs the training loop, computes evaluation metrics and can generate predictions.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example that demonstrates how to apply the CompGCN model to knowledge‑graph completion tasks, enabling researchers and developers to benchmark, fine‑tune, or extend the model in their own projects.
